string.description.discord.command.softban: Bans a person from the server temporarily
string.discord.command.softban.success.embedbod: The user, **${user}**, has been banned for **${time}**. They have been removed from **${guild}** for **${reason}.
string.discord.command.softban.error.unspecifie: The user that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
The time that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid time.
string.discord.command.softban.error.problemocc: An error occurred when using this command.
string.discord.command.softban.error.ratelimit: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
string.discord.command.softban.error.alreadyunb: That user has already been banned!
string.discord.command.softban.error.botmissing: I am missing the `BAN_MEMBER` permission. Please turn that on so I can ban said person.
string.discord.command.softban.error.usermissin: You are missing the `TIMEOUT_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can ban said person.
